title: ALL RANDOM ULTRA RAPID FIRE XMAS MODE
body: So the new Xmas ARURF mode is coming out soon, you can use "All the champs with xmas skins" BUT NOT SONA SHE HAS A XMAS SKIN WHY CANT I PLAY SONA IN ARURF!!! i am quite displeased with this. Riot please add sona to the champ pool for ARURF since sona has a xmas skin

replies.body: Because sona is never balanced in the mode.
also the fact her Christmas skin is more a religious based skin than actually Christmas itself
Silent Night Sona? She's a Christmas caroller it's about as Christmas-y as it gets. She even has a Christmas wreath and stockings on Etwahl.

its still was originally based for religion not on christmas though, even though can be seen as christmas skin

Plus she didn't **SAY **she wanted to be included anyway, so it doesn't matter, she hasn't expressed any discontent in not joining, she can't take the cold.
Was this something that happened when the skin was released? It was before my time so I wouldn't know, but you've well and truly lost me there.
it was before a time riot did christmas events
I mean technically i think he is right with it being more Religion based, but Christmas is mostly a religious holiday so yeah {{sticker:galio-happy}}
I mean if the argument is solely that it's religious based sure, Christmas is therefore the skin is, but I don't think that was really the point :P
Great idea but too late sorry :3. The X-mas mode is ARURF.
